item.title: Frontiers in Traumatic Brain Injury 2018
item.author: C3NL,
item.description: Following the success of the inaugural Frontiers in TBI (FITBI) conference in 2017, we welcome you to the 2nd FITBI conference this July at Imperial College London. A two-day programme of talks, debates, and poster sessions that will cover scientific advances into the fundamental understanding of â€¦
